publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3365# Mr John McAllion: Scottish Gulf War Veterans-That the Parliament recognises the deep concern over the health conditions of Scottish Gulf War veterans and believes that the Scottish Executive should recognise their illness and ensure that they receive the appropriate treatment. Supported by: Dennis Canavan*, Dorothy-Grace Elder*, John Farquhar Munro*, Elaine Smith*, Tommy Sheridan*, Alex Neil*, Ms Sandra White*, Tricia Marwick*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Tavish Scott*, Ms Margo MacDonald*, Dr Winnie Ewing*
S1M-3365# Scottish Gulf War Veterans (lodged on 6 September 2002) Christine Grahame*, Mr Andrew Welsh*, Donald Gorrie*
S1M-3365# Scottish Gulf War Veterans (lodged on 6 September 2002) Helen Eadie*, Robert Brown*, Linda Fabiani*
S1M-3365# Scottish Gulf War Veterans (lodged on 6 September 2002) Bill Butler*
S1M-3365# Scottish Gulf War Veterans (lodged on 6 September 2002) Mr Kenneth Gibson*
S1M-3365# Scottish Gulf War Veterans (lodged on 6 September 2002) Johann Lamont*, Andrew Wilson*
S1M-3365# Scottish Gulf War Veterans (lodged on 6 September 2002) Mr Gil Paterson*
S1M-3365# Scottish Gulf War Veterans (lodged on 6 September 2002) Mr Adam Ingram*
S1M-3365# Scottish Gulf War Veterans (lodged on 6 September 2002) Cathy Peattie*
S1M-3365# Scottish Gulf War Veterans (lodged on 6 September 2002) Brian Adam*
